Text.Name: Modifier_LingZhi_DiaoXie
Text.Desc: SymLawize with the Spiritual Root, feel the vibe of sadness released by the withering Spiritual Plant, and your Mental State is slightly disturbed.

Text.Name: Modifier_LingZhi_GT0_Jin
Text.Desc: Cultivate near a Metal Spirit Root to enter the state of sympathy with it. Perception increased, Mental State increased, Cultivation Speed decreased, Potential increased.

Text.Name: Modifier_LingZhi_LT0_Jin
Text.Desc: Cultivate near a Metal Spirit Root to enter the state of sympathy with it. Perception increased, Mental State decreased, Cultivation Speed increased, Potential decreased.

Text.Name: Modifier_LingZhi_GT0_Mu
Text.Desc: Cultivate near a Wood Spirit Root to enter the state of sympathy with it. Constitution increased, Mental State increased, Cultivation Speed decreased, Potential increased.

Text.Name: Story_LingZhi_XinJing1
Text.Desc: Mental State is increased for a short period of time.

Text.Name: Story_LingZhi_XinJing2
Text.Desc: Mental State is decreased for a short period of time.
